about:
Hi, I'm Justin Alfonso, a passionate video and photo editor specializing in creating engaging and dynamic content for social media. I have a knack for editing short-form videos like TikToks, gameplay montages, Instagram and Facebook reels, and YouTube Shorts, bringing stories to life in just a few seconds. I also craft eye-catching visuals for digital platforms, such as customized Discord banners and YouTube thumbnails.


I started this journey by editing videos and photos for myself, honing my skills and developing a unique style that resonates with audiences. Now, I'm ready to help you elevate your digital presence with compelling, creative content tailored to your brand.
